short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auralis AI Support is here to assist you 24/7!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Auralis AI Support Chrome Extension! This Chrome extension is designed to provide on-demand customer or agent support, seamlessly integrating with your existing systems to enhance user experience and streamline support processes.

Features: 
- On-Demand Support: Instantly provide customer support directly from the Chrome 
  browser.
- User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use interface for customers.
- Customizable: Tailor the extension to meet your specific support needs and branding 
  requirements.
- Custom Knowledge Base: The customer's queries are answered exclusively from your 
  companies knowledge base present within your widget.
- Analytics and Reporting: Track support interactions and gather valuable insights through 
  detailed analytics and reporting via the Auralis dashboard.
- Persistent Memory: The chrome extension stores the widget id and chat history in your profile. 
  No need to worry about chat history getting cleared. You can always restart the conversation 
  and start anew!
